title: About
mission: We're on a mission to revolutionize how teams collaborate and organize their ideas. RiverFlow was born from the frustration of existing mindmap tools that felt clunky and disconnected.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: RiverFlow started in 2023 when our founder Sarah realized that existing mindmap tools were missing something crucial: the ability to collaborate seamlessly in real-time.
story.p2: After months of research and prototyping, we built RiverFlow from the ground up with collaboration at its core. Today, thousands of teams use RiverFlow to organize their thoughts and bring their ideas to life.
story.p3: We're just getting started. Our vision is to become the go-to platform for creative teams worldwide.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries to create better tools for creative thinking.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Teamwork makes the dream work. We believe in the power of collective ideas.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Speed and reliability are non-negotiable. We optimize for every millisecond.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Every decision is guided by our users' needs and feedback.
